headline.print_headline: Canadians Bid Farewell to Jim Flaherty, Former Finance Minister
headline.main: Canadians Bid Farewell to Jim Flaherty, Former Finance Minister

lead_paragraph: Canada's political elite and hundreds of well-wishers paid final respects to former Finance Minister Jim Flaherty at a state funeral on Wednesday, with Prime Minister Stephen Harper depicting Flaherty as a man who put his own needs aside in the service of his country.
